column1: Art Institute of Chicago////WHAT TO DO IF YOU DON'T HAVE MUCH TIME (Less than 2 hours): When you enter the museum
column2: make sure you grab a map. At the back of the map
column3: there are about 20 must see pieces of art. Their locations are stated on the map as well
column4: so when you walk into a certain gallery
column5: you know what artwork to look out for.
